title: Algo Design QCE Tutorial Part I
subtitle: High-level Algorithm Design with Qmod
description: This workshop (Part I) teaches high-level algorithm design with Qmod: language concepts, quantum types, and evaluation modes. It walks through Qmod structure with small examples and includes five code exercises (with TODOs and solutions). Part II applies these concepts in a full algorithm (QAOA for knapsack).
friendly_name: Algo Design QCE Tutorial Part I
